meanings.definition: Overwhelmed or deeply impressed by a famous person or celebrity.
meanings.sent1: She felt starstruck when she met her favorite singer.
meanings.sent2: The fans were starstruck when they saw the famous actor in person.
meanings.sent3: Even though she tried to act cool, her starstruck expression gave her away.
meanings.sent4: His starstruck gaze lingered on the Hollywood star as if she were a goddess.
meanings.sent5: The moment was so magical, it left her completely starstruck.

meanings.definition: To be in a state of awe or admiration towards a well-known individual.
meanings.sent1: He starstruck everyone with his heartfelt speech at the event.
meanings.sent2: The young girl starstruck at the sight of her favorite athlete.
meanings.sent3: The puppy seemed to starstruck at the cat's acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset never fails to starstruck those who witness it.
meanings.sent5: As the singer hit the high note, she could feel the audience starstruck by her talent.
